data.title: JOYALUKKAS INDIA LIMITED
data.meta_description: Check Joyalukkas India Limited registration details online. Get financial highlights, company network & industry details. Sign Up now for more reports & updates
data.text:
OVERVIEW - JOYALUKKAS INDIA LIMITED

Joyalukkas India Limited is an unlisted public company incorporated on 22 April, 2002. It is classified as a public limited company and is located in Thrissur, Kerala. It's authorized share capital is INR 1,500.00 cr and the total paid-up capital is INR 770.38 cr.

Joyalukkas India Limited's operating revenues range is Over INR 500 cr for the financial year ending on 31 March, 2023. It's EBITDA has increased by 27.84 % over the previous year. At the same time, it's book networth has increased by 37.16 %. Other performance and liquidity ratios are available here.

Description: The company operates jewelry and apparel stores in India. It sells jewelry made from gold, diamond and other precious stones, platinum, and silver.

Products & Services: studs, chains, bangles, necklaces, bracelets, rings, and anklets; and textile products comprise saris, menâ€™s wear, ladies wear, kids wear, and life style clothing products

Category: Manufacturer & Distributer

The current status of Joyalukkas India Limited is - Active.

The last reported AGM (Annual General Meeting) of Joyalukkas India Limited, per our records, was held on 20 July, 2024.

Joyalukkas India Limited has seven directors - Alukkas Varghese Joy, John Paul Joyalukkas, and others.

The Corporate Identification Number (CIN) of Joyalukkas India Limited is U51398KL2002PLC015372. The registered office of Joyalukkas India Limited is at DOOR NO. 5/309-3, BISHOP ALAPATT ROAD, FATHIMA NAGAR, MISSION QUARTERS, THRISSUR, Thrissur, Kerala.

Directors - JOYALUKKAS INDIA LIMITED

The company has 7 directors and 3 reported key management personnel.

The longest serving director currently on board is Alukkas Varghese Joy who was appointed on 15 November, 2015. Alukkas Varghese Joy has been on the board for more than 8 years. The most recently appointed director is Thomas Mathew, who was appointed on 07 December, 2023.

Alex Kalluvila Babu has the largest number of other directorships with a seat at a total of 19 companies. In total, the company is connected to 40 other companies through its directors.
